title: Citi sees Amazon, Alphabet and Meta as key players in AI
text: primeimages Citi’s research team said on Monday that it remains bullish on AI as one of the critical thematic investing categories and spotlighted specific stocks in the category. In looking at the sector, the firm specifically showcased its interest in Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN), Alphabet (NASDAQ:GOOG) and Meta Platforms (NASDAQ:META). "Our focus continues to be three pronged as we search for operating leverage, growth-at-a-reasonable-price, and confidence in top-line trajectories," Citi stated.
